definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Ju Jdg 6:26 place or means of safety, protection (MT sfs. as if from [[עזז]], but prob. erron., cf. Buhl:Lex 13 Ges:§ 85 k);—´[[מ]] abs. Ju Jdg 6:26 +, cstr. Is 30:2 +; sf. [[מָעוּזִי]] 2Sa 22:33 (but rd. [[הַמְּאַזְּרֵנִי]] as ‖ Ps 18:33), [[מָעוּזִּי]] Ps 31:3 +, [[מָעֻזִּי]] Is 27:5 +, [[מָעוּזּוֹ]] Ps 52:9 +, [[מָעֻזּׁה]] Da 11:10, etc. (rd. prob. [[מְעוֹזִּי]], etc.); pl. [[מָעֻזִּים]] v:Da 11:38, v:Da 11:39, sf. [[מָעֻזְּנֶיהָ]] Is 23:11, read [[מָעֻזֶּיהָ]] (Ges:§ 20 o Che:Heb. Hpt. al.; del. d. f. in all, v. supr.);—

lit. place of safety Ju Jdg 6:26, hence (c. collat. idea of strength, as if fr. [[עזז]] = fastness Is 23:11, Is 23:14 (in v:Is 23:14 Che:Heb. Hpt. prop. [[מְחוֹזְכֶם]] your city), Ez Eze 24:25, Eze 30:15, Da 11:7, Da 11:10, Da 11:19, ´[[הַמִּקְדָּשׁ הַמּ]] v:Da 11:31, [[מִבְחְרֵי]] [[מָעֻזִּים]] v:Da 11:39; [[הַיׇּם]] ´[[מ]] i.e. harbour Is 23:4, but del. O1 Du Che:Hpt.; [[מֵאוֹיֵב]] ´[[מ]] Na 3:11; cf. ´[[עָרֵי מ]] Is 17:9.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of a heathen god, [[אֱלוֹהַּ מָעֻזִּים]] Da 11:38 (rd. [[מְחׂזִים]] cities Che:Is 23, 1, Heb. Hpt.).
fig. of human protection, [[פַּרְעׂה]] ´[[מ]] Is 30:2, Is 30:3 (both ‖[[צֵּל]] [[מִחְרַיִם]]); [[ראׁשִׁי]] ´[[אֶפְרַיִם מ]] Ps 60:9 = Ps 108:9, i.e. my helmet; also (of angel) Da 11:1 (‖[[מַחֲזִיק]]).
